snippet: Sabra Dipping Company opened a plant in Mexico to make dips tailored for the Latin American market.
abstract: Sabra dips joint venture of PepsiCo and the Strauss Group opens a $10 million plant in Mexico to make snack products tailored for the Latin American market; products made in Mexico and sold outside the United States will use the brand name Obela.
lead_paragraph: Sabra Dipping Company opened a plant in Mexico to make dips tailored for the Latin American market.

headline.seo: Foreign Cuisine, Branded in America, Sells to Global Market
headline.main: Foreign-Inspired and U.S.-Branded Snacks, Now Made in Mexico
headline.print_headline: Foreign-Inspired and U.S.-Branded Snacks, Now Made in Mexico
